<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Malleable Movement](/Feats.aspx?ID=3863) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 205</row>

**Archetype** [Mind Smith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=194)

**Prerequisites**
[Mind Smith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3862)

**Trigger**
You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81).

</column>

---

You shift the shape of your weapon to help you Leap farther and faster. You shift your weapon into a long flexible pole, climbing hook, or similar aid, adding an extra 5 feet to the distance you're able to Leap. As normal, this can't increase the distance of your Leap beyond your Speed.
name: Malleable Movement
